articles.description: Co-creator and interviewer Kirk Docker gives a fascinating insight into the making of the hit ABC show that gives a voice to marginalised and misunderstood Australians and the challenge of finding people willing to go on the program.

articles.title: Transplant success after liver kept 3 days - The West Australian
articles.description: Doctors have for the first time preserved a damaged liver for three days before transplanting it into a patient, who remains health a year after surgery.
articles.content:
